channel.title: Custom Capes! (FF5, Showbread, Mountain Dew, Rootbeer!)
channel.description:
[font=times new roman]Don't comment saying it's a stupid recolor. It's a waste of space, and a waste of time because really, it's not going to say anything to me.
Mountain Dew Cape - took about 3 hours for the logo. Mug Root Beer Cape: (I think I want to add a little more to it.) - took about 6 hours for the logo. Raw Rock Cape: (RAW ROCK KILLS!) - Showbread. - took about 30 minutes for the logo. Family Force 5 Cape: (It wasn't meant to look pretty.. I like FF5, but I was bored & really tired.. not paying attention, being really sloppy.) - took about 40 minutes for the FF5 logo.
Credits: Jagex for making the cape models Amanda (Me) for making the logo.[/font]
E-mail me if you want them. Brokenstring40@aol.com

item.title: Custom Capes! (FF5, Showbread, Mountain Dew, Rootbeer!)
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“man_killerx, post:5, topic:330933”]Okay, I would like to see a wireframe.

What’s a wireframe?

Are you shitting me? If you modeled for 10 minuites you would know.[/quote]That’s not necessarily true, I didn’t know what a wire frame meant until I posted my models on the site.
I like em, I can see he spent lots of time making the logos resemble the real ones which is a good start.
So maybe he will become a great modeler because he can see the smaller details.

Read full topic
item.source: Custom Capes! (FF5, Showbread, Mountain Dew, Rootbeer!)

item.source: Custom Capes! (FF5, Showbread, Mountain Dew, Rootbeer!)

item.title: Custom Capes! (FF5, Showbread, Mountain Dew, Rootbeer!)
item.dc:creator: @Rawrock Rawrock
item.description:
@Rawrock wrote:

Chill out dude. There is nothing wrong with add things like that. It’s just for fun. Thought I would share it with people. not to mention, IT’S MORE THAN JUST RECOLOR! We are adding to them. Not just little things. The rootbeer logo took me about 6 hours to make. (Not easy!) …and it still isn’t technically finished. The Mountain Dew logo took me about 3 hours. The X-box logo took him about 20 minutes to do.
BUT WHO CARES?
If people like them, then people like them.

I’m not taking the credit for the cape model. I didn’t make it!
I made the logo!!!
It was just for FUN!
Not even on my server. TAKE A CHILL PILL!

I used Metasequoia to make the logos. I felt like pasting it on something to see how it would look… I grabbed a grab because it was the first thing I saw. Devin is my brother, he saw what I was doing, wanted to try it out as well.

What’s a wireframe?

Forgive me for not being a “Genius.”
If you tell me what it is, i’ll show you if I can.

Read full topic
item.source: Custom Capes! (FF5, Showbread, Mountain Dew, Rootbeer!)
